Scripts.OnMouseDown: -- OnMouseDown(self, button) if ( button == "LeftButton" ) then self:GetParent():StartMoving(); end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: -- OnMouseDown(self, button) if ( button == "LeftButton" ) then self:GetParent():StopMovingOrSizing(); end

Scripts.OnVerticalScroll: -- OnVerticalScroll(self, offset) FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(self, offset, EkWaitList_WaitFrame_Height, EkWaitList_WaitFrame_ListUpdate);
